alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:24PM MDT until July 06 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 324 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of New Raymer to 7 miles north of Riverside Reservoir, or along a line extending from 19 miles north of Fort Morgan to 28 miles east of Greeley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Raymer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
